channel.title: Comments for page "Stock Certificate"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Stock Certificate"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I wanna stress on the fact 1-4 mill rate was discussed at forum several times as "inflation and so on" and I remember dicsription of item (when u click on it at BvS) "…1-4…", SO THIS IS NERF! yer, McM allways right as this is his game, but this is nerf at least because enough men got 3 tiny bee as he see-> less bawing about this too random and difficult check (this is my personal thoughs about this, yer, politics lie (people) allways, politics (duty) is a dirty business :D)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
reduced from 1-4 million to 1-3 million.

http://www.animecubed.com/billy/forum/viewtopic.php?f=1&t=19840

McMasters: "Bugfix, not nerf - it said 1-3MRyo for a long long time, I just misread the function that made the Certs, and fixing it was low priority."
